channel.title: [Release] Lightsaber [Release]
channel.description: Thanks for the nice comments and i did make glow just dont feel like uploading pics :P Link: http://uppit.com/66zda6cm1lt7/Lightsaber.rar PICTURES Hilt [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2cfp8b6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/315cs61.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/hvruj4.jpg[/img] Whole Lightsaber [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2818wpf.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/j0cpr5.jpg[/img] and remember this is my 1st lightsaber so CC please :)

item.title: [Release] Lightsaber [Release]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Google Mr Google
item.description:
@Mr_Google wrote:

[quote=“tubefish, post:4, topic:394776”]i like it, i think ima try to make a lightsaber, probably yodas

but i do think this is a good model[/quote][quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:10, topic:394776”]Quite interesting enough mate, nice one![/quote][quote=“Loveandpower, post:9, topic:394776”]This is really good actually. Original was too poly but I see you fixed that.[/quote][quote=“poopler40, post:5, topic:394776”]every time you post a new model it better than the last im impressed. it has a really neat wire frame, it actually looks like a light saber and not a dildo.

try this. go to the object menu. double click you model and a box will pop up got to were it says smoothing and change the number to 120.0 it will smooth out the sharp edges without adding any poly. that is what i did for my death plate chest and it turned out great.[/quote]
Thanks for all the nice comments

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Lightsaber [Release]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Google Mr Google
item.description:
@Mr_Google wrote:

poopler40:

you can by just making the laser part transparent, or you can do that and then clone the model. delete every thing except the laser part on the Cloned model. scale it to make is a couple inches smaller than laser part on the original model and place it inside then merge the two models

k ill try 2moro im getting tired 10:52 pm here plus we got test in mornin

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Lightsaber [Release]
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

you can by just making the laser part transparent, or you can do that and then clone the model. delete every thing except the laser part on the Cloned model. scale it to make is a couple inches smaller than laser part on the original model and place it inside then merge the two models

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Lightsaber [Release]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Google Mr Google
item.description:
@Mr_Google wrote:

[quote=“poopler40, post:5, topic:394776”]every time you post a new model it better than the last im impressed. it has a really neat wire frame, it actually looks like a light saber and not a dildo.

try this. go to the object menu. double click you model and a box will pop up got to were it says smoothing and change the number to 120.0 it will smooth out the sharp edges without adding any poly. that is what i did for my death plate chest and it turned out great.[/quote]
k thnx any advice on making it glow??

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Lightsaber [Release]
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

every time you post a new model it better than the last im impressed. it has a really neat wire frame, it actually looks like a light saber and not a dildo.

try this. go to the object menu. double click you model and a box will pop up got to were it says smoothing and change the number to 120.0 it will smooth out the sharp edges without adding any poly. that is what i did for my death plate chest and it turned out great.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] Lightsaber [Release]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Google Mr Google
item.description:
@Mr_Google wrote:

reyx7:

U don’t need to say what number model it is anymore. The blade itself doesn’t need thar many polys, it will exactly the same without them.

k reduced poly now its 15 poly
